deploy.startCommand: pwd && ls -la && python -c 'import os; from pathlib import Path; BASE_DIR = Path("/app"); print("BASE_DIR:", BASE_DIR); print("static path:", os.path.join(BASE_DIR, "static")); print("exists?", os.path.exists(os.path.join(BASE_DIR, "static")))' && python manage.py findstatic core/css/index.css --verbosity 2 || echo 'File not found' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --verbosity 2 && python manage.py migrate && python -m daphne soti_delivery.asgi:application --port $PORT --bind 0.0.0.0
